story:
Murder is on the menu as Chef Tim Nadin will go to any means necessary to fulfill his life long obsession and win the coveted Michelin Star.

Tim Nadin is always on a shaky ground. Due to his hypersensitive sense of taste that left him with an unratifiable curiosity, he has earned a great reputation for himself and has become a well-known name in the culinary world.

An accident that was destined to happen, has pushed Tim to a sinful path and awoken his obsession with finding exquisite tastes.

While he is blindly contemplating his perfect dish, he crosses over the dark side and the nerve shattering chaos begins.

Follow Tim and his bloody trail all in search of perfection.

We need £3500 to pay for locations, Crew and cast and props, While they are very passionate they are giving up time and work to be in this project,

We also want to make it known we are very passionate with the cast and crews health and safety so COVID19 Guidelines Will be taken VERY SERIOUSLY you can rest assured that you would be funding a very safe project. The contracts for cast and crew will Enforce such guide-lines as social distance and Masked Crew at all times. We will Providing  sanitizers and fully safe food options too. No takeaways! everything brought on set will be disposable other than props and equipment.

If we don’t raise all the funds, the funds will do towards all of our current costs and we will make the trailer regardless. We will raise the funds ourselves. Every Donation no matter how big or small will get a credit.

So this is the very first project I will bring to life risks are so many people have so much faith in this project and being my first if it wasn’t to go to plan it wouldn’t help for my future projects. But I have a very professional and very close-knit team that can more than make up for my inexperience. Also we only have 1 day to shoot so we will have a very strict timetable.

Hi, my name is Simon I am 34 years old, living in a little town called Leigh on Sea in England.

I am turning to INDIEGOGO in a final attempt to bring my vision to life. I am just an ordinary English guy, who is passionate about acting and writing, I believe I have written a very unique script that is worthy of making it on the big screen.

But unfortunately, as you all know, it can be extremely difficult to be heard in the entertainment industry for independent up and comers.

In Search of Perfection, is in the making for 2 years now, crew and cast are ready to start production. The feedback I have received has been amazing, however despite all my effort I am struggling to find anyone willing to financially sponsor the film.

I was going through some hard times, losing faith having every door shut in my face, I was ready to give up on my dream.

Then I came across Ray Vazquez and Chris Marciante of Guerrilla Revolution Productions, and they have given me the courage to keep going.

So.. here I am, asking you to please help me, and donate to this cause. Whatever amount you able to contribute, would be greatly appreciated.

I understand that in a middle of a pandemic you might think ‘’ there are more important things to worry about’’ and you feel like if you were to donate to any cause you rather give to something that has more meaningful contribution to the world.

That is perfectly reasonable. However, if you able to contribute to my cause with as little as you can spare, it would bring me one step closer to make my dream become a reality.

I have had the pleasure of knowing and working with Julian for years. He is exactly who I envisioned for this role. He is an actor who has won multiple awards very professional and extremely versatile. I am excited to have him bringing my vision to life. I'm sure once you learn more about him, you'll agree that he is perfect for the role and will be a great asset to our team. He has managed to build a great reputation, has an immense fan base and well known by the UK Independent Film makers. 

Julian is a professional international actor/model recognised by IMBD https://www.imdb.com/name/nm6919747/

his latest show reel can be seen here

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5JMiqcA3CuU&amp...

Ray is an actor who is moving strides in the industry and I firmly believe that it’s only a matter of time before he gets discovered. Although, I have not had the chance to work with him personally, I am very impressed with his performance and work ethic. He is extremely professional and happy to take part in the most challenging scenes given to him. He is also very passionate about the projects he works on and is very keen to share and promote
project his involved in.

Ray is a professional actor recognised by IMBD

https://www.imdb.com/name/nm4836232/ His

latest show reel can be seen here

https://mediaviewer.spotlight.com/metadata/vide...& pub=1

I had the privilege of working with Jona as well, on multiple occasions. Him and Dan works side by side flawlessly and makes the perfect team. His CV includes working with many recognised companies such as Adidas, Nissan, ITV, Channel 4…. Etc

Latest show reel can be seen here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kkklypkO2J0&amp...

CV and profile can be seen here:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/jonah-ripley-919a3963/

I had the privilege to work side by side with Dan on multiple occasions, and I say it with confidence he is very talented, and despite his young age he is a highly experienced professional. His impressive CV includes working with recognized companies such as Moneban London where he was creating digital content Formula 1, Just eat,
Amazon Prime…. Etc

Latest show reel can be seen here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S638MoS6H1w&amp...

His web page can be found here:

https://www.danallen.co.uk/

Gaz is a good friend of mine. He is a freelance professional photographer. My vision is with him, that he captures all the actions behind the scenes for promotional purposes of working in a pandemic safely. I have learned it is a very good tool for publicity and getting sponsors as well. Gaz has built a respected reputation within the industry he has significant amount of links and contacts that I firmly believe would be beneficial for the project. Gaz has worked with many pop artists in the past sets as Duran Duran and Bronski Beat.

His IMDB can be seen here:

https://www.imdb.com/name/nm5763108/?fbclid=IwA... F2DJYoDW0ud3Is

I have worked with Rory in the past and he is a very reliable and talented young guy. Rory is an amateur film maker/sound recordist who often does his own sound which is always impeccable.

His IMDB can be seen here:

https://www.imdb.com/name/nm9247396/?fbclid=IwA... e-y1WfFNRxfFkUg

I have never known a more passionate gaffer then Will. He has worked on many large and high budgeted project such as Vaseline, Nike, B&Q and also the Stereophonics.

A very talented makeup artist who specializes in blood and gore. She has been highly recommended from multiple contacts of mine she's also local so very ideal to see her work with the prosthetics. 

Her website can be seen here:

https://www.vshowcards.com/profile/tequila-loui...

Jasmine is a very talented young up and comer. She is currently studying theatrical and media make up. She has been creating the full story board for the trailer and will assist on sets as and when needed.

Kitti will be here for health and safety measures her job will be to enforce social distance and make sure the environment is safe in regards to COVID19 Guidelines Will be taken VERY SERIOUSLY you can rest assured that you would be funding a very safe project.  She will also be our fist aider.

If you can't donate anything at all  or if you could share this project on your social media and tell your friends about In Search Of Perfection

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt: Murder is on the menu as Chef Tim Nadin will go to any means necessary to fulfill his life long obsession and win the coveted Michelin Star.Tim Nadin is always on a shaky ground. Due to his hypersensitive sense of taste that left him with an unratifiable curiosity, he has earned a great reputation for himself and has become a well-known name in the culinary world.An accident that was destined to happen, has pushed Tim to a sinful path and awoken his obsession with finding exquisite tastes.While he is blindly contemplating his perfect dish, he crosses over the dark side and the nerve shattering chaos begins.Follow Tim and his bloody trail all in search of perfection.We need £3500 to pay for locations, Crew and cast and props, While they are very passionate they are giving up time and work to be in this project,We also want to make it known we are very passionate with the cast and crews health and safety so COVID19 Guidelines Will be taken VERY SERIOUSLY you can rest assured that you would be funding a very safe project. The contracts for cast and crew will Enforce such guide-lines as social distance and Masked Crew at all times. We will Providing  sanitizers and fully safe food options too. No takeaways! everything brought on set will be disposable other than props and equipment.If we don’t raise all the funds, the funds will do towards all of our current costs and we will make the trailer regardless. We will raise the funds ourselves. Every Donation no matter how big or small will get a credit.So this is the very first project I will bring to life risks are so many people have so much faith in this project and being my first if it wasn’t to go to plan it wouldn’t help for my future projects. But I have a very professional and very close-knit team that can more than make up for my inexperience. Also we only have 1 day to shoot so we will have a very strict timetable.Hi, my name is Simon I am 34 years old, living in a little town called Leigh on Sea in England.I am turning to INDIEGOGO in a final attempt to bring my vision to life. I am just an ordinary English guy, who is passionate about acting and writing, I believe I have written a very unique script that is worthy of making it on the big screen.But unfortunately, as you all know, it can be extremely difficult to be heard in the entertainment industry for independent up and comers.In Search of Perfection, is in the making for 2 years now, crew and cast are ready to start production. The feedback I have received has been amazing, however despite all my effort I am struggling to find anyone willing to financially sponsor the film.I was going through some hard times, losing faith having every door shut in my face, I was ready to give up on my dream.Then I came across Ray Vazquez and Chris Marciante of Guerrilla Revolution Productions, and they have given me the courage to keep going.So.. here I am, asking you to please help me, and donate to this cause. story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone, it's the New Year, and we are back! Kenny From the Jump has returned!  We are here because we need to complete the 1st season by completing the last two episodes.  We would like to say thank you to everyone who contributed last time!  The last round help us cover the majority of the production costs; (shoutout to Safari restaurant and Faded Needles for allowing us to use their establishments as locations), Kenny from the Jump has received a lot of attention and is attracting an audience that is asking for more. We are so glad to have received that feedback, and we would like to ask for more contributions to continue the series onward and upwards. 

What We Need & What You Get   

We'll need to raise $6,000 with your help!

Here are how the contributions will be used: 

-Hire professional editors and color graders to make the episodes look as clean as possible.  

-Locations for 2 scenes left in the series.  We rely on local businesses for our locations,  therefore we are required to pay them because they will have to cease operations while we film.    

-Sound recorder/ sound engineer: Most good productions can be undone with bad sound.   

-Transportation:  Since we are using different locations, we'll need adequate transportation for talent, crew, and equipment.    

-Craft services: We have to feed people! 2

-Opening credits sequence for the show: Every good show needs an opening credits sequence. 

The Impact

The series is a great opportunity to showcase my writing and directing skills.  As we have been shooting and making this web series, we have had the opportunity to bring up and collaborate with newer actors and talent in the industry.  We have also had the great opportunity to work with local businesses and local communities, which give them opportunities to promote what they do and how they do it. 

Risks & Challenges

Many things can go wrong in the course of shooting a TV series: 

- Weather:  Sometimes, as much as one may plan for certain conditions, mother nature may have different plans in store for you, which can in turn slow down production, and have financial consequences.    

- Coordinating everyone's schedules: Many of the people we work with usually have other projects that they have lined up, which is part of the nature of freelance work.  This can also impact production costs, as sometimes due to schedule conflict, we'll have to pay more to substitute a crew member out last minute.    

-Understaffing: It is hard to find the right amount of people to help out with production and on-set duties.  I want to make sure I have enough funds in order to ensure that I have enough people on set to where I can focus on working with the talent.      

-Broken Equipment:  As much as we want things on set to go smoothly, sometimes it cannot be helped and equipment may malfunction or break, which is something that the funds raised will help cover production insurance. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that everyone we reach out to may not be able to contribute money, however there are other ways you can help:   

-Spread the word to your friends, family, and strangers even if you are an exceptionally social personality!  

-If you live in the New York City area, you can volunteer to help out on the set as a Production Assistant! You'll even have your name in the credits.    

-If you know someone else that would be interested in donating to this campaign, send the campaign link their way, and they will receive producer credits for the show.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Steve Becker and I am the lead creator of the web series Brazzy Jazzy. I won't bore you with the details of my life (that's what the video is for), but I will bare my soul as to why I created this show. I have been involved with stand-up comedy & filmmaking for more than 20 years. I have also been travelling to Brazil for more than 20 years (watch the video for why). What better way to combine all of my talents and experiences gained over the last 20 years than to create a show about a Brazilian Girl coming to NYC to become a fashion designer. Granted, I know almost nothing about fashion, but my Brazilian wife does (I have the credit card receipts to prove it). Plus, she knows what it's like to come to NYC and survive our cold winters, strange language, and even stranger culture.  Much as I had to survive Brazil's hot weather (ok not such a hardship), strange language, and super strange culture (you have to see to believe it).

There have been many twists and turns on this multicultural journey to elusive television success. We have shot 2 teaser reels, a full TV Pilot, a 2nd TV Pilot, and finally, the first 60 minutes of the series. What's worth doing is worth doing right (Shakespeare??). But, finally, we have a nearly finished product we are happy with and believe you will be happy with as well. The goal is to show how ambition, intellect, & talent are often not enough to overcome culture differences, language barriers, and extreme weather (I was not bred to be an Amazonian). However, the overriding hope of ours was to show these cultural and geographical challenges in a non-stereotypical but hopefully funny way.You will be the final judge on that one.

As part of this Indiegogo campaign, we are launching the first episode of Brazzy Jazzy. The link  is right here. It's officially BRAZZY JAZZY TIME!!

 

The rest of the 13 episodes will be released in July. But to keep you all tingly with excitement, we have attached the Teaser reel for the entire first season. 

And if that wasn;t enough, we have the full breakdown of all the characters and plot lines as well as bios on all the actors and creative team on our website: http://www.BrazzyJazzy.com

The Impact

I created this show to demonstrate to the American Audience the passion Brazilians bring to life in NYC as well as the challenges faced by all, especially immigrants, striving for the American dream. I like to believe that I have a unique understanding and connection with Brazil - My mother was a professor of Brazilian Studies at Brown, I lived in Brazil off & on the last 20 years, my wife is Brazilian, I am an acai addict (who isn't?).

After running my own business successfully for years, I have had the opportunity to travel the world extensively. As much as I have tried to instantly acclimate to foreign cultures, I have often felt like the classic fish out of water. Given my comedy background and life experiences,  I feel I can depict the cultural outsider in comic situations with hopefully witty insight.

Shockingly, there are no shows about Brazilian-America life on TV or how their culture differs greatly from the more media saturated Hispanic experience. That is until now!

So please watch the show and don't be shy about offering your opinion. All points of view are welcome and I hope the show provokes a healthy, civil debate about Brazilians in the USA.

What We Need & What You Get

In making this show, we the creators have already invested $50,000 of our own money. That's how passionately we believe in this project. We are looking to raise $25,000 to finish the editing of Season 1 while investing heavily in the marketing of the series.  All funds raised will go directly to production and post production expenses.  Any monies raised above our goal will go towards the production of season 2 which has already been written.

To help you feel like you are getting something substantial for your contribution (besides your enjoyment of watching the show) we have created some unique and exciting perks.

My wife Zuzu's NYC skin care spa is one of the sponsors of the series. She is offering various treatments for free (sorry, ladies only) with your $200 or $300 donation. These include a revitalizing lymphatic massage or the ever popular Velashape cellulite reduction treatment. Check out www.SpaZuzu.com for more details. Plus we have our other Spa  (Bellastetica) in Rio for those Brazilians needing some skin rejuvenation.

For your $75 donation, you get to choose one snazzy Brazzy Jazzy T-shirt that depicts an iconic scene or saying from the show. They come in 3 colors and 3 styles. For $100, you get a coffee mug set with the same iconic scenes and sayings from the show.

For our business community, we offer 3 types of branded sponsorship similar to SpaZuzu's motion graphic in front of episode 1.

  • A 5 second motion graphic before an episode with the "Sponsored by" designation
  • A 5 second motion graphic after an episode with the "Sponsored by" designation
  • Displaying your logo at the end of the episode with a "Additional sponsored by" designation.

We also have some other unique perks (dinner with the cast, signed poster, designer outfits from the show, a speaking part in Season 2) for other contribution levels which you can check out to our right. All in all, we want you to feel part of the team and for the experience to be memorable. T-Shirts, mugs, and magnets are forever, right?

A Sincere Thank You

Asking for a monetary donation is not easy to do. So before you hit the donate button, or even if you don't, I want to thank you for supporting this project. If your support is just watching Season 1  and telling your friends to do the same, that will help to get our view counts up on YouTube (subscribe to our channel) and demonstrate that a market for this show truly exists. It's time for Brazilians to stand up and be counted! We are an important & vibrant market in the USA!! 

So buckle up, it is going to be a bumpy ride. A bumpy, sexy, funny, caffeinated ride!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not in a position to donate cold hard cash (or warm soft brigadeiros), there are still many other ways you can be actively involved and help us out! 

  • Please share our project on social media! Including this campaign and our teaser videos.
  • Locations: Do you have access to locations that we could use to film next season? Donate your locations!  Apts, Bars, Restaurants, Office Spaces, Boutiques, etc. 
  • Wardrobe: Do you design clothes? Do you want to share your fashion ideas? Do you want to lend clothes to the show?
  • Contribute Music: hear your tunes in our show!  Create Brazzy Jazzy theme songs!
  • Graphic Design Skills: You could help us design our posters and marketing materials. We always could use more merchandise and clothing design ideas and help.
  • Donate your skills- what are you good at? Hit us up and we'll tell you how you can help! 
  • Brazilian or American Business: Want to share your products/services in the USA or Brasil? Contact us at: media@brazzyjazzy.com with any and all ideas. 

Be sure to like us on social media!! IG/FB @brazzyjazzytv & subscribe to our YouTube channel to be kept up to date on future episode releases.

IT'S BRAZZY JAZZY TIME!!

PORTUGUESE VERSION

Introdução

Meu nome é Steve Becker e eu sou o principal criador da série da web Brazzy Jazzy. Eu não vou te entediar com os detalhes da minha vida (é para isso que serve o vídeo), mas vou mostrar minha alma a respeito de porque eu criei esse show. Eu estive envolvido com comédia stand-up e cinema há mais de 20 anos. Também viajo para o Brasil há mais de 20 anos (assista ao vídeo). Que melhor maneira de combinar todos os meus talentos e experiências adquiridos ao longo dos últimos 20 anos do que criar um show sobre uma menina brasileira que vem para a NYC para se tornar uma designer de moda. Concedido, eu não sei quase nada sobre moda, mas minha esposa brasileira faz (eu tenho os recibos de cartão de crédito para provar isso). Além disso, ela sabe o que é vir a NYC e sobreviver os invernos frios, a uma língua estranha e a uma cultura ainda mais estranha. Tanto quanto eu tive que sobreviver ao tempo quente do Brasil (ok, não é uma dificuldade), uma língua estranha e uma cultura super estranha (você tem que ver para acreditar).

Houve muitas reviravoltas nesta jornada multicultural para o evasivo sucesso televisivo. Nós filmamos dois teaser reels, um piloto de TV completo, um segundo piloto de TV e, finalmente, os primeiros 60 minutos da série. Vale a pena fazer o que vale a pena fazer certo (Shakespeare ??). Mas, finalmente, temos um produto quase acabado que estamos felizes e acreditamos que você também ficará feliz. O objetivo é mostrar como ambição, intelecto e talento muitas vezes não são suficientes para superar diferenças culturais, barreiras linguísticas e condições climáticas extremas (eu não fui criado para ser um amazonense). No entanto, a nossa maior esperança era mostrar esses desafios culturais e geográficos de uma maneira não estereotipada, mas esperançosamente engraçada. Você será o juiz final sobre isso. Como parte dessa campanha do Indiegogo, estamos lançando o primeiro episódio de Brazzy Jazzy. O link está acima. É oficialmente BRAZZY JAZZY TIME !!

O restante dos 13 episódios será lançado em julho. Mas para mantê-lo todo contagiante de emoção, nós anexamos o Teaser Reel durante toda a primeira temporada. E se isso não bastasse, temos o colapso completo de todos os personagens e enredos, bem como bios em todos os atores e equipe criativa em nosso site: http://www.BrazzyJazzy.com
 

O IMPACTO

Eu criei este show para demonstrar à American Audience a paixão que os brasileiros trazem à vida em Nova York, bem como os desafios enfrentados por todos, especialmente os imigrantes, lutando pelo sonho americano. Eu gosto de acreditar que tenho uma compreensão e uma conexão únicas com o Brasil - Minha mãe foi professora de estudos brasileiros na Brown, morei no Brasil e nos últimos 20 anos, minha esposa é brasileira, sou viciada em açaí, etc . Tive a sorte de ter viajado pelo mundo depois de administrar meu próprio negócio com sucesso por anos. Por mais que eu tenha tentado me aclimatar instantaneamente a culturas estrangeiras, muitas vezes me senti como o peixe clássico fora d'água. Dada a minha experiência de comédia e experiências de vida, sinto que posso descrever o outsider cultural em situações cômicas com uma visão esperançosa e espirituosa. De maneira chocante, não há programas sobre a vida da América Latina na TV ou como sua cultura difere muito da experiência hispânica mais saturada pela mídia. Isso é até agora! Então, por favor, assista o show e não tenha vergonha de oferecer sua opinião. Todos os pontos de vista são bem-vindos e espero que o programa provoque um saudável debate civil sobre brasileiros nos EUA.

O que precisamos e o que você recebe

Ao fazer esse show, nós, os criadores, já investimos US $ 50.000 do nosso próprio dinheiro. É assim que apaixonadamente acreditamos neste projeto. Queremos arrecadar US $ 25.000 para terminar a edição da 1ª temporada enquanto investimos pesado no marketing da série. Todos os fundos levantados irão diretamente para as despesas de produção e pós-produção. Qualquer quantia levantada acima do nosso objetivo irá para a produção da segunda temporada que já foi escrita. Para ajudá-lo a sentir que está recebendo algo substancial por sua contribuição (além do prazer de assistir ao programa), criamos algumas vantagens únicas e empolgantes.

O spa da minha esposa Zuzu em NYC é um dos patrocinadores da série. Ela está oferecendo vários tratamentos gratuitamente (desculpem, somente mulheres) com sua doação de US $200 ou US $300. Estes incluem uma massagem linfática revitalizante ou o sempre popular tratamento de redução de celulite Velashape. Confira www.SpaZuzu.com para mais detalhes. Além disso, temos o nosso outro Spa (Bella Estetica) no Rio para aqueles brasileiros que precisam de algum rejuvenescimento da pele.

Para sua doação de US $ 75, temos as elegantes camisetas Jazzy Brazzy que retratam cenas icônicas do show. Eles vêm em 3 cores e 3 estilos.

Por US $ 100, você ganha um conjunto de 4 canecas de café com as mesmas cenas icônicas e dizendo a partir do show.

Para nossa comunidade de negócios, oferecemos três tipos de patrocínio de marca semelhantes ao gráfico animado do SpaZuzu na frente do episódio 1.

  • Um gráfico em movimento de 5 segundos antes de um episódio com a designação "Patrocinado por"
  • Um gráfico em movimento de 5 segundos após um episódio com a designação "Patrocinado por"
  • Exibindo seu logo no final do episódio com uma designação "Adicional patrocinado por".

Também temos algumas outras vantagens exclusivas (jantar com o elenco, pôster assinado, roupas de designer do show, falando na segunda temporada) para outros níveis de contribuição que você pode conferir à nossa direita.

Em suma, queremos que você se sinta parte da equipe e que a experiência seja memorável. T-shirts, canecas e ímãs são para sempre, certo?

Um sincero obrigado

Pedir doação monetária não é fácil de fazer. Então, antes de apertar o botão doar, ou mesmo que você não, eu quero agradecer por apoiar este projeto. Se o seu apoio é apenas assistir a primeira temporada e pedir a seus amigos que façam o mesmo, isso ajudará a fazer com que a nossa opinião conte com o YouTube (assine o nosso canal) e demonstre que realmente existe um mercado para esse programa. É hora dos brasileiros aparecer e serem contados! Somos um mercado importante e vibrante nos EUA !!

Então aperte os cintos, vai ser uma viagem acidentada. Um passeio acidentado, sexy, engraçado e cafeínado!

Outras maneiras de ajudar

Se você não está em condições de doar dinheiro vivo (ou brigadeiros suaves e quentes), ainda há muitas outras maneiras de se envolver ativamente e nos ajudar!

  • Por favor, compartilhe nosso projeto nas redes sociais! Incluindo esta campanha e nossos vídeos teaser.
  • Locais: você tem acesso a locais que poderíamos usar para filmar na próxima temporada? Doe seus locais! Apts, Bares, Restaurantes, Escritórios, Boutiques, etc.
  • Wardrobe: Você projeta roupas? Você quer compartilhar suas ideias de moda? Você quer emprestar roupas para o show?
  • Contribute Music: ouça suas músicas no nosso show! Crie músicas tema do Brazzy Jazzy!
  • Habilidades de Design Gráfico: Você pode nos ajudar a projetar nossos cartazes e materiais de marketing. Nós poderemos usar mais idéias de design de mercadorias e roupas.
  • Doe suas habilidades, o que você é bom? Contactamos e vamos dizer-lhe como você pode ajudar!
  • Brazilian or American Business: Quer compartilhar seus produtos / serviços nos EUA ou no Brasil? Contacte-nos em: media@brazzyjazzy.com com todas e quaisquer ideias.

Gostamos nas redes sociais !! IG / FB @brazzyjazzytv e assine o nosso canal no YouTube para se manter atualizado sobre futuros lançamentos de episódios.

 É BRAZZY JAZZY TIME !!
story_txt:
Short Summary
My name is Steve Becker and I am the lead creator of the web series Brazzy Jazzy. I won't bore you with the details of my life (that's what the video is for), but I will bare my soul as to why I created this show. I have been involved with stand-up comedy & filmmaking for more than 20 years. I have also been travelling to Brazil for more than 20 years (watch the video for why). What better way to combine all of my talents and experiences gained over the last 20 years than to create a show about a Brazilian Girl coming to NYC to become a fashion designer. Granted, I know almost nothing about fashion, but my Brazilian wife does (I have the credit card receipts to prove it). Plus, she knows what it's like to come to NYC and survive our cold winters, strange language, and even stranger culture.  Much as I had to survive Brazil's hot weather (ok not such a hardship), strange language, and super strange culture (you have to see to believe it).
There have been many twists and turns on this multicultural journey to elusive television success. We have shot 2 teaser reels, a full TV Pilot, a 2nd TV Pilot, and finally, the first 60 minutes of the series. What's worth doing is worth doing right (Shakespeare??). But, finally, we have a nearly finished product we are happy with and believe you will be happy with as well. The goal is to show how ambition, intellect, & talent are often not enough to overcome culture differences, language barriers, and extreme weather (I was not bred to be an Amazonian). However, the overriding hope of ours was to show these cultural and geographical challenges in a non-stereotypical but hopefully funny way.You will be the final judge on that one.
As part of this Indiegogo campaign, we are launching the first episode of Brazzy Jazzy. The link  is right here. It's officially BRAZZY JAZZY TIME!!

 
The rest of the 13 episodes will be released in July. But to keep you all tingly with excitement, we have attached the Teaser reel for the entire first season. 

And if that wasn;t enough, we have the full breakdown of all the characters and plot lines as well as bios on all the actors and creative team on our website: http://www.BrazzyJazzy.com
The Impact
I created this show to demonstrate to the American Audience the passion Brazilians bring to life in NYC as well as the challenges faced by all, especially immigrants, striving for the American dream. I like to believe that I have a unique understanding and connection with Brazil - My mother was a professor of Brazilian Studies at Brown, I lived in Brazil off & on the last 20 years, my wife is Brazilian, I am an acai addict (who isn't?).
After running my own business successfully for years, I have had the opportunity to travel the world extensively. As much as I have tried to instantly acclimate to foreign cultures, I have often felt like the classic fish out of water. Given my comedy background and life experiences,  I feel I can depict the cultural outsider in comic situations with hopefully witty insight.
Shockingly, there are no shows about Brazilian-America life on TV or how their culture differs greatly from the more media saturated Hispanic experience. That is until now!
So please watch the show and don't be shy about offering your opinion. All points of view are welcome and I hope the show provokes a healthy, civil debate about Brazilians in the USA.

What We Need & What You Get
In making this show, we the creators have already invested $50,000 of our own money. That's how passionately we believe in this project. We are looking to raise $25,000 to finish the editing of Season 1 while investing heavily in the marketing of the series.  All funds raised will go directly to production and post production expenses.  Any monies raised above our goal will go towards the production of season 2 which has already been written.
To help you feel like you are getting something substantial for your contribution (besides your enjoyment of watching the show) we have created some unique and exciting perks.
My wife Zuzu's NYC skin care spa is one of the sponsors of the series. She is offering various treatments for free (sorry, ladies only) with your $200 or $300 donation. These include a revitalizing lymphatic massage or the ever popular Velashape cellulite reduction treatment. Check out www.SpaZuzu.com for more details. Plus we have our other Spa  (Bellastetica) in Rio for those Brazilians needing some skin rejuvenation.
For your $75 donation, you get to choose one snazzy Brazzy Jazzy T-shirt that depicts an iconic scene or saying from the show. They come in 3 colors and 3 styles. For $100, you get a coffee mug set with the same iconic scenes and sayings from the show.
For our business community, we offer 3 types of branded sponsorship similar to SpaZuzu's motion graphic in front of episode 1.

A 5 second motion graphic before an episode with the "Sponsored by" designation
A 5 second motion graphic after an episode with the "Sponsored by" designation
Displaying your logo at the end of the episode with a "Additional sponsored by" designation.

We also have some other unique perks (dinner with the cast, signed poster, designer outfits from the show, a speaking part in Season 2) for other contribution levels which you can check out to our right. All in all, we want you to feel part of the team and for the experience to be memorable. T-Shirts, mugs, and magnets are forever, right?

A Sincere Thank You
Asking for a monetary donation is not easy to do. So before you hit the donate button, or even if you don't, I want to thank you for supporting this project. If your support is just watching Season 1  and telling your friends to do the same, that will help to get our view counts up on YouTube (subscribe to our channel) and demonstrate that a market for this show truly exists. It's time for Brazilians to stand up and be counted! We are an important & vibrant market in the USA!! 
So buckle up, it is going to be a bumpy ride. A bumpy, sexy, funny, caffeinated ride!

Other Ways You Can Help
If you're not in a position to donate cold hard cash (or warm soft brigadeiros), there are still many other ways you can be actively involved and help us out! 

Please share our project on social media! Including this campaign and our teaser videos.
Locations: Do you have access to locations that we could use to film next season? Donate your locations!  Apts, Bars, Restaurants, Office Spaces, Boutiques, etc. 
Wardrobe: Do you design clothes? Do you want to share your fashion ideas? Do you want to lend clothes to the show?
Contribute Music: hear your tunes in our show!  Create Brazzy Jazzy theme songs!
Graphic Design Skills: You could help us design our posters and marketing materials. We always could use more merchandise and clothing design ideas and help.
Donate your skills- what are you good at? Hit us up and we'll tell you how you can help! 
Brazilian or American Business: Want to share your products/services in the USA or Brasil? Contact us at: media@brazzyjazzy.com with any and all ideas. 

Be sure to like us on social media!! IG/FB @brazzyjazzytv & subscribe to our YouTube channel to be kept up to date on future episode releases.
IT'S BRAZZY JAZZY TIME!!
PORTUGUESE VERSION
Introdução
Meu nome é Steve Becker e eu sou o principal criador da série da web Brazzy Jazzy. Eu não vou te entediar com os detalhes da minha vida (é para isso que serve o vídeo), mas vou mostrar minha alma a respeito de porque eu criei esse show. Eu estive envolvido com comédia stand-up e cinema há mais de 20 anos. Também viajo para o Brasil há mais de 20 anos (assista ao vídeo). Que melhor maneira de combinar todos os meus talentos e experiências adquiridos ao longo dos últimos 20 anos do que criar um show sobre uma menina brasileira que vem para a NYC para se tornar uma designer de moda. Concedido, eu não sei quase nada sobre moda, mas minha esposa brasileira faz (eu tenho os recibos de cartão de crédito para provar isso). Além disso, ela sabe o que é vir a NYC e sobreviver os invernos frios, a uma língua estranha e a uma cultura ainda mais estranha. Tanto quanto eu tive que sobreviver ao tempo quente do Brasil (ok, não é uma dificuldade), uma língua estranha e uma cultura super estranha (você tem que ver para acreditar).
Houve muitas reviravoltas nesta jornada multicultural para o evasivo sucesso televisivo. Nós filmamos dois teaser reels, um piloto de TV completo, um segundo piloto de TV e, finalmente, os primeiros 60 minutos da série. Vale a pena fazer o que vale a pena fazer certo (Shakespeare ??). Mas, finalmente, temos um produto quase acabado que estamos felizes e acreditamos que você também ficará feliz. O objetivo é mostrar como ambição, intelecto e talento muitas vezes não são suficientes para superar diferenças culturais, barreiras linguísticas e condições climáticas extremas (eu não fui criado para ser um amazonense). No entanto, a nossa maior esperança era mostrar esses desafios culturais e geográficos de uma maneira não estereotipada, mas esperançosamente engraçada. Você será o juiz final sobre isso. Como parte dessa campanha do Indiegogo, estamos lançando o primeiro episódio de Brazzy Jazzy. O link está acima. É oficialmente BRAZZY JAZZY TIME !!
O restante dos 13 episódios será lançado em julho. Mas para mantê-lo todo contagiante de emoção, nós anexamos o Teaser Reel durante toda a primeira temporada. E se isso não bastasse, temos o colapso completo de todos os personagens e enredos, bem como bios em todos os atores e equipe criativa em nosso site: http://www.BrazzyJazzy.com

 
O IMPACTO
Eu criei este show para demonstrar à American Audience a paixão que os brasileiros trazem à vida em Nova York, bem como os desafios enfrentados por todos, especialmente os imigrantes, lutando pelo sonho americano. Eu gosto de acreditar que tenho uma compreensão e uma conexão únicas com o Brasil - Minha mãe foi professora de estudos brasileiros na Brown, morei no Brasil e nos últimos 20 anos, minha esposa é brasileira, sou viciada em açaí, etc . Tive a sorte de ter viajado pelo mundo depois de administrar meu próprio negócio com sucesso por anos. Por mais que eu tenha tentado me aclimatar instantaneamente a culturas estrangeiras, muitas vezes me senti como o peixe clássico fora d'água. Dada a minha experiência de comédia e experiências de vida, sinto que posso descrever o outsider cultural em situações cômicas com uma visão esperançosa e espirituosa. De maneira chocante, não há programas sobre a vida da América Latina na TV ou como sua cultura difere muito da experiência hispânica mais saturada pela mídia. Isso é até agora! Então, por favor, assista o show e não tenha vergonha de oferecer sua opinião. Todos os pontos de vista são bem-vindos e espero que o programa provoque um saudável debate civil sobre brasileiros nos EUA.
O que precisamos e o que você recebe
Ao fazer esse show, nós, os criadores, já investimos US $ 50.000 do nosso próprio dinheiro. É assim que apaixonadamente acreditamos neste projeto. Queremos arrecadar US $ 25.000 para terminar a edição da 1ª temporada enquanto investimos pesado no marketing da série. Todos os fundos levantados irão diretamente para as despesas de produção e pós-produção. Qualquer quantia levantada acima do nosso objetivo irá para a produção da segunda temporada que já foi escrita. Para ajudá-lo a sentir que está recebendo algo substancial por sua contribuição (além do prazer de assistir ao programa), criamos algumas vantagens únicas e empolgantes.
O spa da minha esposa Zuzu em NYC é um dos patrocinadores da série. Ela está oferecendo vários tratamentos gratuitamente (desculpem, somente mulheres) com sua doação de US $200 ou US $300. Estes incluem uma massagem linfática revitalizante ou o sempre popular tratamento de redução de celulite Velashape. Confira www.SpaZuzu.com para mais detalhes. Além disso, temos o nosso outro Spa (Bella Estetica) no Rio para aqueles brasileiros que precisam de algum rejuvenescimento da pele.
Para sua doação de US $ 75, temos as elegantes camisetas Jazzy Brazzy que retratam cenas icônicas do show. Eles vêm em 3 cores e 3 estilos.
Por US $ 100, você ganha um conjunto de 4 canecas de café com as mesmas cenas icônicas e dizendo a partir do show.

Um gráfico em movimento de 5 segundos antes de um episódio com a designação "Patrocinado por"

Em suma, queremos que você se sinta parte da equipe e que a experiência seja memorável. T-shirts, canecas e ímãs são para sempre, certo?

Pedir doação monetária não é fácil de fazer. Então, antes de apertar o botão doar, ou mesmo que você não, eu quero agradecer por apoiar este projeto. story:
“In the early 21st century, perhaps the most important artistic genre is science fiction … [It shapes] how people understand the profound technological, social, and economic developments of our time.” —Yuval Noah Harari

“Regardless of social construct, the Rich, the Beautiful and the Resourceful will always have the best that society has to offer.” - Langston Hughes.

 

“They're madly in love and want to make the world a better place with their human enhancement discoveries, but the government and corporate competitors  would rather see David and Maggie Clark dead. “

 

This is The Next Iteration

a near future drama providing critical insight into who we are and who we can become

Synopsis

The year is 2055 and advances in biotechnology and related fields have transformed the physical and life sciences. The results are critical new biology-related fields making it possible to genetically "engineer" a faster, stronger, smarter human being -- The Next Iteration of Human. Through government and corporate collusion, these enhancement technologies are only available in select elite circles. Exceptional is the new standard by which all social benefits are now distributed. Drs. David and Maggie Clark are former DARPA researchers that have since gone into business ostensibly manufacturing one of the many over-the-counter fixes available to some in this near-future world, but secretly engaged in their own campaign to empower a whole generation of people being left behind, with advanced genetic enhancements that the Corporatocracy wants to control.

Story Overview
In the near-future, evolutionary forces are being accelerated through the concerted efforts of scientific and technological exploration and manipulation. There is the expectation that the next iteration of human existence will be characterized by a faster, stronger, smarter, longer living, more efficient human being with artificial genesis but who will naturally reproduce the next iteration of human.
        There is blowback from the headlong pursuit of faster, stronger, smarter. Many intelligent, capable people are feeling the crunch from technological displacement; Radical groups like “Anonymous”, and the anti-globalization folks are actively challenging the Corporatocracy’s control of enhancement technologies.


         Our protagonists, Drs. David and Maggie Clark, are doing Cognitive Enhancement -- using drugs, genetic therapies and tissue engineering, Cyborgization of the senses with artificial hearing and sight, electronic neural implants allowing for the direct augmentation of cognition with brain prostheses, brain-to-brain communication, and wireless connection to the Internet. They largely depend on their own discretion to choose newlyweds, and young kids with "natural" ability to begin enhancement treatments they will master over the years. The doctors keep a database of all the enhancees and steer into friendly economic and social cliques where the proselytizing and open recruitment takes place. The “third-rail” of human enhancement is germline modification, and computers that control, and robots that possess, human level cognition, emotions and abilities.
          This series will provide multiple mappings of the complex, interlinked social changes brought on by these transformative technologies, to gain critical insight into who we are and who we can become. Drs David and Maggie Clark and their international network of bio-hackers and activist, are out to make sure a critical mass of regular people are part of this future by using their knowledge and network to challenge the Corporatocracy’s control.

The First Season

Human enhancement is a reality but all enhancements are not created equally. There will be three Large Storylines relating to the new social reality that will drive the first season: The Public Question. The Resourceful Answer. The 1% Reality.

Race for Governor (The Public Question)
The race for governor represents the Public Question. It provides the framework for dramatizing the public human enhancement debate. In 2016 the Transhumanist Party fielded a candidate for President of the United States, generating little more than novelty attraction from counterculture internet surfers. In 2055, the issues surrounding Automation and Artificial Intelligence, Genetic and human-computer augmentation and their impact on the economy of existence for the vast working class is in full relief. Louise Zalazar, is a leading candidate for governor and a firm believer in transhumanism as a social responsibility.

Race for Enhancements (The Resourceful Answer)
This story is about the hope of regular people and their efforts to get beyond the struggles of everyday life; people smart enough to know something better is available, but not connected to the upper echelons of privilege that provides access; these are the resourceful people. The aspirations of Jasmine Wilson, former soldier,  and her star high school athlete son, Trey, will carry this story. Jasmine knows that “exceptional” is the new normal and is determined to see her son succeed. Where there are possibilities there is hope.

Race for the Next Iteration (The 1% Reality)
This is the geopolitical story that frames the Clark's quest to "Manufacturer Competitiveness" that will usher in a world-wide balance of power. Their efforts are focused on People, Places and Productivity: they are constantly on the look-out for "their kind of people" to enhance; their Smart City endeavor is the Place, the Shangri-la of innovation; and the innovations from their company, Bio-patch, that provide the Productivity driving their dreams, with only Maggie’s humanitarian instincts and whip smart technological insight providing a contentious check on David’s maniacal competitiveness.

Principle Characters

Dr. Rachel Margaret “Maggie” Clark is a Neurobiologist. She started her career at the Defense Agency Research Project Agency (DARPA) specializing in the interface between the brain and computers, mind-uploading, and genetic cognitive augmentation. Maggie was among the first generation of people receiving genetic cognitive enhancements. Her scientist father died in a suspicious accident when she was 14 years old and she and her mother fell out of the rarefied world his career afforded them. This exposed Maggie to a different way of life, and she saw first-hand how the advances in technology and genetics were being coveted by the wealthy and elite, and were not trickling down to regular people.

Dr. David Clark, a Cognitive Neuroscientist and Geneticist, and former star researcher at the United States government’s top secret research agency, the Defense Agency Research Projects Agency (DARPA), is driven by a desire to rebuild society. He spent time in an exchange program with the Chinese equivalent of DARPA, the National Basic Research  Program, and came away impressed with how far along China was in “engineering genius”, and quietly committed himself to a similar pursuit among “his kind” of people to close a gap that was widening at an accelerated pace due to selective distribution of enhancement technologies. He is madly in love with Maggie, the only thing that seems to temper his competitiveness.

Jasmine Wilson. 38. Religious, clever, strong, former U.S. Army soldier who fought in the ISIS War in 2025, where she lost her husband to a classified mission, and she will stop at nothing to protect her child (Trey). Served under William Russell.

Terrance James “Trey” Wilson III 16, a very serious student and extraordinary athlete. Not fully aware of the level of human enhancement necessary to go to the next level. Hot headed, wants it all now, has hero syndrome compensating for not knowing his father.

Sven Galesman, 62 (103), former MIT Molecular Biologist, preeminent genetic researcher, Professor of Biology and Bioengineering at the Karolinska Institute, Sweden, a leading member of an international community of bio-hackers committed to keeping the pathways to evolutionary enlightenment open to the commons. Sven is a member of the Polar Bear club and a former freestyle mountain climber.

Dr. Robert “Bob” Sinclair, 75 one of the first to experiment with the telomere chromosome, he earned his Ph.D. in Molecular and Population Genetics at the University of Pittsburgh in the 1960s. Formerly, Director of Technology Development at the Department of Health and Human Services, keeps company with a cabal of right-wing fanatics that shuffle in and out of government and industry. Sinclair is convinced that without the strong, forceful guidance from the government private partnerships he represents through his current employer, Globalgene, the transformative nature of the emerging technologies could be used by any number of groups and governments to challenge Western dominance. Loves old Robert Deniro movies.

Dr. Chu Ng, 34 (76) billionaire real estate developer and Chinese national, educated at the prestigious Sun Yat-sen University in Guangzhou, China, which implies ties to the upper levels of the Chinese government and possibly its intelligence services. While Prof. Chu's complete history is a bit of a fog, there is evidence linking him to the work of Teuvo Kohonen, a pioneer of neural networks over 100 years ago that was at the intersection of neuroscience, machine learning and robotics. While his work with David Clark is driven also by a strong belief in the human spirit of competition and right to pursue a good life, Prof. Chu is a realist and a loyal Chinese National.

Betty Roy -- 38, former hacker-for-hire, turned federal informant, turned federal agent. Liz was the fall-girl for a much larger conspiracy, knowledge of which she managed to leverage into a job rather than the orange jumpsuits her hacker friends were donning on an unmarked ship to Guantanamo Bay, Cuba. Duplicitous, could be working both sides.

Ikemba Okafor, 49 (97), The governor’s state of Bayelsa is perfectly positioned for access to land, sea and air, has a stable and prosperous middle-class and a first rate research university. The governor has distinguished himself amongst his colleagues because of his accomplishments in attracting money and talent with his plans of turning Baylesha into a smart-city, complete with its own power grid, satellite network and plans for an aerospace program. As a young medical student and son of a prominent Nigerian businessman, Gov. Okafor was with the Chinese when they were doing advanced telomere research and testing.

Louise Zalzar: State Senator from Hamilton Heights in her early 40s. Married with three children. Idealistic but not naïve. A player in state politics for the past 10 years. A standard bearer of progressive politics (increase in UBI/social benefits, the Biogenetic Personal Freedom Act, and repeal of the Redundancy Act) and just outspoken enough to have run a foul party bosses on both sides of the aisle but is prime to be the next governor with even bigger aspirations. 

Theresa (Russell) Lucas: Captain in US Army Reserve and an admitted daddy’s girl. She was happy to follow in his footsteps of military service. For the happily married, mother of three, losing her mother to cancer was a major blow but to see her father do the unthinkable, “surrender” and in such a way is devastating to her and her family. 

William Russell: Retired after 30 plus years in the Army, having graduated from West Point, saw action in locations around the world for 20 years.  After retirement, Russell to his surprise and dismay, was unable to find any work above menial janitorial and or push-button work, which wasn’t an extreme problem until his wife was diagnosed with Non-Hodgkin’s Lymphoma. After watching his beloved wife deteriorate before his eyes, Russell had hit an emotional bottom that was compounded by rising mounting medical debt and ever present cutbacks in government and post military benefits. Russell is convinced that he’s doing the right and noble thing for the many suffering from similar circumstances.

SEASON 1: Episodic Breakdown

REDUNDANCY

Clock is ticking waiting for Supreme Court decision that could usher in new era of Assisted Suicide, expanding the definition of Terminally Disabled to include Terminal Redundancy. William Russell, 52 year old former Marine, has kicked off this maelstrom with his request to die.  Drs. Maggie and David Clark are part of an international network that is at the center of the debate about human redundancy in the age of smart machines. The efforts to broaden availability of human enhancement tech is also at center stage in the hotly contested governor's race of Louise Zalazar.

TRYING TO GET ON

Louise Zalazar, a committed Transhumanist, has suddenly got the attention of the National Security apparatus. Dr. Robert Sinclair, intelligence officer for the high-tech defense contractor, Globalgene, continues to mislead the public about enhancements. Jasmine Wilson, former soldier, fears for her own son's future and is desperate to learn more about advanced enhancements. Maggie is preparing to pitch the owner of a portfolio of sports franchises for the contract to provide sanctioned enhancement therapies to his teams.

MAINTAINING RELATIONSHIPS

Dr. Chu comes to Clark’s for risky memory implantation procedure to replace recent memory of government agent, Betty Roy. Maggie opposed, David reluctantly contacts ace neurosurgeon, Sven Galesmen, to perform risky virtual surgery. Trey Wilson and his mom Janice continue their pursuit of advanced enhancements, while the smart city deal gets a boost from the Chinese.

STUFF HAPPENS

Bio-patch malfunction causes Zalazar’s partner to go into temporary coma, causing political and media uproar. Globalgene instigated Congressional hearings trying to shut down competing enhancements. Rev. Thomas learns information that could jeopardize his relationship with Jasmine. African Smart-city partner threatens to replace BioPatch. David is preparing to testify at a Congressional hearing on pending legislation that could cripple Biopatch’s latest research.

RECRUITMENT AND RETENTION

We learn about the Biopatch Experimental Group, apostles of the Biopatch network. BEG began when David and Maggie were in an exchange program at the Chinese National Research Group, where they met Ikemba Okafor’s father, former regional governor in Nigeria, and a biotechnology evangelist with whom David and Maggie started the secret embro enhancement project.

EUREKA, WE DID IT!

Biopatch Research produces programmable biological computer that uses genetic material to program functions into living cells, big advance beyond simply reading electrocardiographic signals and stimulating electrochemical signals. The implications are huge and the Corporatocracy is agitated.

STAKES ARE TOO HIGH

Maggie and David’s reconcile their beef over the activities of the network as she boards a plane to attend the official opening ceremony for the Nigerian Smart City Project.

POLITICS AND STRANGE BEDFELLOWS

As the campaign winds to a close, it has become a referendum on enhancements, with the Luddites vehemently opposed, the Middle-class demanding broader access, the Elite trying to maintain monopoly and control, a battle that will continue into the second and third seasons as David and Maggie Clark continue to challenge the Corporatocracy through pursuit of their ambitious goals.

Production

The near-future time-frame provides us with the flexibility to create a minimalist futuristic setting without drastically re-imaging the landscape. This is a character driven drama, with the mood and feel of an  “X-files” adventure in pursuit of a “Wakanda-like” world.

Virtual Set Production

We intend to shoot the series using the on-set, real-time rendering capabilities of the Unreal Gaming Engine with Volumetric Camera Tracking, the latest innovation utilizing the photo-realistic, multi-dimensional rendering capabilities known in the gaming industry, to radically transform the location and on-set capabilities of even the most modest production. See video below.

Production Budget and Timetable

Our first season of eight (8) episodes at ten (10) minutes per episode, is budgeted at $50,000, roughly $6k per episode, including music.

In addition to the savings realized from shooting virtual, as a long-time industry professional, I have relationships with many award-winning film technicians and creatives that make it possible for us to produce a quality show at this price. My partner and head writer, Melody Cooper, is coming off a big year in which she won Best Screenplay at the 2019 Urban World Film Festival, has been spotlighted as an up and coming writer by the industry, is now actively represented by Circle of Confusion, the Hollywood management company packaging many of today’s successful films. Together, we have developed a dynamic circle of collaborators that are engaged and excited by The Next Iteration.

Production Timetable

Upon commencement of production, our time will be spent accordingly:

* Pre-production 10 weeks - writing, casting, rehearsing, computer set design 

* Principal Photography 3 weeks

* Post Production 12 weeks

Distribution. Audience Development. Overages.

We are crowdfunding this series because we are entrepreneurs. Our strategy is to use what we raise to produce the series one episode at a time if need be, $6,000 per episode.

Our hope is that this series will become a self-sustaining enterprise through a direct relationship with the people that are intrigued by the stories we tell.*

I have spent all of my adult life as an entrepreneur in the entertainment business. I have had international success with the projects I've been directly involved with, and I have created evergreen programming for top industry players. In the over 25 years that I've been in the business as an attorney, distributor and producer, I have developed a very clear vision for the industrial-sized possibilities that great programming can create. Crowdfunding and it's evolution from donor based to the opportunity for equity ownership, is empowering entrepreneurs outside of the corridors of Wall Street/Hollywood, and democratizing the media landscape of images and ideas.

Our strategy of using the short-form "webisode" format is designed for immediate impact with our audiences wherever they are, and to quickly scale up once the production ball is rolling and the community is growing. We can work within the confines of important industry organizations like SAG, while maintaining maximum budgetary flexibility: we can produce the whole season of eight episodes for roughly $6,000 per episode, or $50k for Season One.

In our minds, as entrepreneurs, our per episode cost is calculated to achieve maximum quality at the most efficient price, allowing for a realistic opportunity to achieve a respectable return on investment without having to go from zero to 100 mph immediately, giving the series time to steadily grow its audience. Our intentions to shoot the series utilizing Virtual Set technology is part of this effort to achieve maximum quality at an efficient price. The scenic and location flexibility, cost savings and dynamism of the Unreal Gaming engine's photo-realistic rendering, increases the upward possibilities of ROI for independently produced and distributed audio-visual entertainment.

In the event we raise more money for production than currently budgeted, we will use overages to support our community building, marketing and distribution efforts.

Team Members

Marlin L. Adams, Creator/Producer.

Entertainment attorney, film distributor and producer. In addition to representing a number of talented and successful Artists, I Broke ground with film distribution company, KJM3 Entertainment Group, the company behind the domestic and international success of  Julie Dash’s “Daughters of the Dust”, and 2018 Academy Award nominee, Raoul Peck’s, “Man By the Shore”, among other successful filmmakers we distributed in the 90’s. I also created and produced the evergreen biography series, “Journeys in Black” for BET/Viacom, along with my partner at the time, Sam Pollard, who received an Academy Award nomination for "Four Little Girls", the documentary feature by Spike Lee, his long-time collaborator.

Melody M. Cooper,  Head Writer/Producer

Melody's work has won or placed in several competitions, most recently, she was one of eight people chosen out of 3,000 applicants for the HBO Access Writing Program 2019. Melody is currently signed with Hollywood management group, Circle of Confusion, and working on projects with Sundance award-winning director Sebastian Silva, and producer Adi Shankar. Her ​latest feature screenplay, NORTHERN CROSS, a dramatic thriller with magical realism, won the Grand Jury Prize for Best Screenplay at the 2018 Urbanworld Film Festival.

Logan Dobbs, Writer

“LD” is a multi-talented writer, editor and DP, with a multitude of ideas and projects brewing.

Supplemental  Material

Our Proof of Concept film 

Jett Sets video - 

 

Jamie Metzl with Joe Rogan - for anyone interested in a laymans discussion of human enhancement and its revolutionary implications, this episode of the JRE will leave you ... ready for the Next Iteration of human existence.
story_txt:
“In the early 21st century, perhaps the most important artistic genre is science fiction … [It shapes] how people understand the profound technological, social, and economic developments of our time.” —Yuval Noah Harari“Regardless of social construct, the Rich, the Beautiful and the Resourceful will always have the best that society has to offer.” - Langston Hughes. “They're madly in love and want to make the world a better place with their human enhancement discoveries, but the government and corporate competitors  would rather see David and Maggie Clark dead. “ This is The Next Iterationa near future drama providing critical insight into who we are and who we can becomeSynopsisThe year is 2055 and advances in biotechnology and related fields have transformed the physical and life sciences. The results are critical new biology-related fields making it possible to genetically "engineer" a faster, stronger, smarter human being -- The Next Iteration of Human. Through government and corporate collusion, these enhancement technologies are only available in select elite circles. Exceptional is the new standard by which all social benefits are now distributed. Drs. David and Maggie Clark are former DARPA researchers that have since gone into business ostensibly manufacturing one of the many over-the-counter fixes available to some in this near-future world, but secretly engaged in their own campaign to empower a whole generation of people being left behind, with advanced genetic enhancements that the Corporatocracy wants to control.Story OverviewIn the near-future, evolutionary forces are being accelerated through the concerted efforts of scientific and technological exploration and manipulation. There is the expectation that the next iteration of human existence will be characterized by a faster, stronger, smarter, longer living, more efficient human being with artificial genesis but who will naturally reproduce the next iteration of human.        There is blowback from the headlong pursuit of faster, stronger, smarter. Many intelligent, capable people are feeling the crunch from technological displacement; Radical groups like “Anonymous”, and the anti-globalization folks are actively challenging the Corporatocracy’s control of enhancement technologies.         Our protagonists, Drs. David and Maggie Clark, are doing Cognitive Enhancement -- using drugs, genetic therapies and tissue engineering, Cyborgization of the senses with artificial hearing and sight, electronic neural implants allowing for the direct augmentation of cognition with brain prostheses, brain-to-brain communication, and wireless connection to the Internet. They largely depend on their own discretion to choose newlyweds, and young kids with "natural" ability to begin enhancement treatments they will master over the years. The doctors keep a database of all the enhancees and steer into friendly economic and social cliques where the proselytizing and open recruitment takes place. The “third-rail” of human enhancement is germline modification, and computers that control, and robots that possess, human level cognition, emotions and abilities.          This series will provide multiple mappings of the complex, interlinked social changes brought on by these transformative technologies, to gain critical insight into who we are and who we can become. Drs David and Maggie Clark and their international network of bio-hackers and activist, are out to make sure a critical mass of regular people are part of this future by using their knowledge and network to challenge the Corporatocracy’s control.The First SeasonHuman enhancement is a reality but all enhancements are not created equally. There will be three Large Storylines relating to the new social reality that will drive the first season: The Public Question. The Resourceful Answer. The 1% Reality.Race for Governor (The Public Question)The race for governor represents the Public Question. It provides the framework for dramatizing the public human enhancement debate. In 2016 the Transhumanist Party fielded a candidate for President of the United States, generating little more than novelty attraction from counterculture internet surfers. In 2055, the issues surrounding Automation and Artificial Intelligence, Genetic and human-computer augmentation and their impact on the economy of existence for the vast working class is in full relief. Louise Zalazar, is a leading candidate for governor and a firm believer in transhumanism as a social responsibility.Race for Enhancements (The Resourceful Answer)This story is about the hope of regular people and their efforts to get beyond the struggles of everyday life; people smart enough to know something better is available, but not connected to the upper echelons of privilege that provides access; these are the resourceful people. The aspirations of Jasmine Wilson, former soldier,  and her star high school athlete son, Trey, will carry this story. Jasmine knows that “exceptional” is the new normal and is determined to see her son succeed. Where there are possibilities there is hope.Race for the Next Iteration (The 1% Reality)This is the geopolitical story that frames the Clark's quest to "Manufacturer Competitiveness" that will usher in a world-wide balance of power. Their efforts are focused on People, Places and Productivity: they are constantly on the look-out for "their kind of people" to enhance; their Smart City endeavor is the Place, the Shangri-la of innovation; and the innovations from their company, Bio-patch, that provide the Productivity driving their dreams, with only Maggie’s humanitarian instincts and whip smart technological insight providing a contentious check on David’s maniacal competitiveness.Principle CharactersDr. Rachel Margaret “Maggie” Clark is a Neurobiologist. She started her career at the Defense Agency Research Project Agency (DARPA) specializing in the interface between the brain and computers, mind-uploading, and genetic cognitive augmentation. Maggie was among the first generation of people receiving genetic cognitive enhancements. Her scientist father died in a suspicious accident when she was 14 years old and she and her mother fell out of the rarefied world his career afforded them. This exposed Maggie to a different way of life, and she saw first-hand how the advances in technology and genetics were being coveted by the wealthy and elite, and were not trickling down to regular people.Dr. David Clark, a Cognitive Neuroscientist and Geneticist, and former star researcher at the United States government’s top secret research agency, the Defense Agency Research Projects Agency (DARPA), is driven by a desire to rebuild society. He spent time in an exchange program with the Chinese equivalent of DARPA, the National Basic Research  Program, and came away impressed with how far along China was in “engineering genius”, and quietly committed himself to a similar pursuit among “his kind” of people to close a gap that was widening at an accelerated pace due to selective distribution of enhancement technologies. He is madly in love with Maggie, the only thing that seems to temper his competitiveness.Jasmine Wilson. 38. Religious, clever, strong, former U.S. Army soldier who fought in the ISIS War in 2025, where she lost her husband to a classified mission, and she will stop at nothing to protect her child (Trey). Served under William Russell.Terrance James “Trey” Wilson III 16, a very serious student and extraordinary athlete. Not fully aware of the level of human enhancement necessary to go to the next level. Hot headed, wants it all now, has hero syndrome compensating for not knowing his father.Sven Galesman, 62 (103), former MIT Molecular Biologist, preeminent genetic researcher, Professor of Biology and Bioengineering at the Karolinska Institute, Sweden, a leading member of an international community of bio-hackers committed to keeping the pathways to evolutionary enlightenment open to the commons. Sven is a member of the Polar Bear club and a former freestyle mountain climber.Dr. Robert “Bob” Sinclair, 75 one of the first to experiment with the telomere chromosome, he earned his Ph.D. in Molecular and Population Genetics at the University of Pittsburgh in the 1960s. Formerly, Director of Technology Development at the Department of Health and Human Services, keeps company with a cabal of right-wing fanatics that shuffle in and out of government and industry. Sinclair is convinced that without the strong, forceful guidance from the government private partnerships he represents through his current employer, Globalgene, the transformative nature of the emerging technologies could be used by any number of groups and governments to challenge Western dominance. Loves old Robert Deniro movies.Dr. Chu Ng, 34 (76) billionaire real estate developer and Chinese national, educated at the prestigious Sun Yat-sen University in Guangzhou, China, which implies ties to the upper levels of the Chinese government and possibly its intelligence services. While Prof. Chu's complete history is a bit of a fog, there is evidence linking him to the work of Teuvo Kohonen, a pioneer of neural networks over 100 years ago that was at the intersection of neuroscience, machine learning and robotics. While his work with David Clark is driven also by a strong belief in the human spirit of competition and right to pursue a good life, Prof. Chu is a realist and a loyal Chinese National.Betty Roy -- 38, former hacker-for-hire, turned federal informant, turned federal agent. Liz was the fall-girl for a much larger conspiracy, knowledge of which she managed to leverage into a job rather than the orange jumpsuits her hacker friends were donning on an unmarked ship to Guantanamo Bay, Cuba. Duplicitous, could be working both sides.Ikemba Okafor, 49 (97), The governor’s state of Bayelsa is perfectly positioned for access to land, sea and air, has a stable and prosperous middle-class and a first rate research university. The governor has distinguished himself amongst his colleagues because of his accomplishments in attracting money and talent with his plans of turning Baylesha into a smart-city, complete with its own power grid, satellite network and plans for an aerospace program. As a young medical student and son of a prominent Nigerian businessman, Gov. Okafor was with the Chinese when they were doing advanced telomere research and testing.Louise Zalzar: State Senator from Hamilton Heights in her early 40s. Married with three children. Idealistic but not naïve. A player in state politics for the past 10 years. A standard bearer of progressive politics (increase in UBI/social benefits, the Biogenetic Personal Freedom Act, and repeal of the Redundancy Act) and just outspoken enough to have run a foul party bosses on both sides of the aisle but is prime to be the next governor with even bigger aspirations. Theresa (Russell) Lucas: Captain in US Army Reserve and an admitted daddy’s girl. She was happy to follow in his footsteps of military service. For the happily married, mother of three, losing her mother to cancer was a major blow but to see her father do the unthinkable, “surrender” and in such a way is devastating to her and her family. William Russell: Retired after 30 plus years in the Army, having graduated from West Point, saw action in locations around the world for 20 years.  After retirement, Russell to his surprise and dismay, was unable to find any work above menial janitorial and or push-button work, which wasn’t an extreme problem until his wife was diagnosed with Non-Hodgkin’s Lymphoma. After watching his beloved wife deteriorate before his eyes, Russell had hit an emotional bottom that was compounded by rising mounting medical debt and ever present cutbacks in government and post military benefits. Russell is convinced that he’s doing the right and noble thing for the many suffering from similar circumstances.SEASON 1: Episodic BreakdownREDUNDANCYClock is ticking waiting for Supreme Court decision that could usher in new era of Assisted Suicide, expanding the definition of Terminally Disabled to include Terminal Redundancy. story:
MomBoss takes a creative spin on reality television by making its focus positive fun and light.  The show casts entrepreneurial women who are juggling their careers and motherhood. All cast members reside in Jacksonville area, and all have successful businesses ranging from online stores to fitness training. 

MomBoss also revolves around the celebration and inspiration of women who are holding it all together giving the show a relatable feel for all mothers,  but it also has an edge for small business owners to have the opportunity to plug their business as well.

MomBoss is much more than a "fly by night" television show! It's philanthropic and expanding beyond what viewers can see.

MomBossTV. Raise The Kids. Secure The Bag.

​

We officially launched season one last year March 2020. Now that we have had a successful pilot season....It's time for Season Two! To execute this season as fluid as possible, we need to raise fund we are collaborating with Powellful Productions and Mars3045 Productions to bring an even greater season! 

Your funds will be used for:

Cost of production

Location fees

Post production

Marketing and advertising

Cast and crew services

Motherhood and Business are probably the two HARDEST areas that a woman can juggle. With the right support and influence, women in business can learn to navigate the highs and lows of entrepreneurship and motherhood.  MomBoss provides a positive example by shifting the narrative of women in business AND women on television.

Here are a few shocking statistics about women in business:

The US has 12.3 million women-owned businesses.

40% of US businesses are women-owned.

Women receive just 7% of venture funds for their startups.
